tout.altText: Parannoul: After the Magic
tout.title: Parannoul: After the Magic .jpg

title: After the Magic
dek: On the South Korean artist’s astounding third album, the past and the present, the real and the fake dissolve seamlessly into surreal, maximalist pop music.

tout.altText: Mark William Lewis: Living
tout.title: Mark William Lewis: Living

title: Living
dek: The London singer-songwriter’s debut LP frames big themes—the heaviness of life and death, the duality in ecstasy and pain—in skeletal, atmospheric indie rock.

title: Dead Meat

title: Blue Period
